everydesc.kubejs:hb_note: Hello. You have shown me kindness, and for that I thank you. Because of you, I now know what it was to live.
everydesc.kubejs:cd_note: Thank you, stranger, for putting my poor daughter to rest. I follow her now, my heart at peace.
everydesc.kubejs:nh_note: A name! After so long, I had forgotten it, even myself. To have a new name is to live again. Thank you.
everydesc.kubejs:cc_note: You have helped lay low a great evil. Thank you for giving me back my freedom.
